data.title: Press Gazette's Media Strategy USA Network
data.meta_description: Press Gazette’s Media Strategy Network USA is an annual event for senior media executives which takes place in New York.    This event convenes some of America’s most influential executives in the news, media and publishing sectors.  After a successful launch in November 2023, this year’s event is on Thursday November 21, 2024. Through a series […]
data.text:
Company Information

Clipcentric’s creative management and optimization platform powers publishers who are winning at premium display advertising. Partnering with Clipcentric is like having a genius ad engineering team at your fingertips: our powerful tech means any creative vision can become reality with phenomenal turnaround time. Clipcentric’s platform was purpose-built for premium display ads, allowing you to build an ad products portfolio of tested, proven formats across all devices. Streamline creative production, offer rich media and interactive features in your ad products, take advantage of data feeds and DCO, and drive better results for your advertisers. For more information, visit Clipcentric at http://clipcentric.com

Company Information

EX.CO is the world’s leading publisher video technology platform empowering publishers to own their video strategy for maximum yield. EX.CO’s AI-based solutions for video management, video monetization, content automation, and video recommendation are trusted by some of the largest publishers globally including The Arena Group, CBSi, Hearst, Nasdaq, Time, and VICE. Founded in 2012 and headquartered in New York City with employees located around the world, EX.CO is backed by The Walt Disney Company, Saban Ventures, Viola Group, 83North, and Firstime Ventures. For more information, visit ex.co.

Company Website

To learn more , please visit our website - https://ex.co/

Company Information

Glide Publishing Platform (GPP) makes content management problems go away for publishers, so they can focus on content and revenue.

It’s a cloud-native service freeing publishers from having to become CMS companies, so precious dev resource can go towards things that generate income. Focus on what your audiences love; let GPP sweat the boring stuff.

Trusted by blue-chip publishers and loved by editors, GPP speeds success by cutting launch times by over 75%, and helps content go further by giving you more time and better tools to make it perfect for your audiences.

GPP is the ultimate modern publisher toolset.

Company Website

To learn more , please visit our website - https://www.gpp.io/

Company Information

InsurAds is a revolutionary player in the digital advertising industry, transforming the way publishers optimize attention, enhance live content impact, and drive revenue convergence.

By leveraging real-time data analytics on a unique user per impression level, InsurAds has built the World’s 1st Time & Attention Management Platform, that has our AOS (Attention Operating System) at its core.

With our Attention Management Cloud Platform-as-a-Service, we empower publishers to maximize their advertising revenue and establish a live audience connection.

Currently, our platform reaches an impressive 1.7 billion unique users on a monthly basis. Our range of groundbreaking products, such as Sub$ponsor, GXI, and Insurance MAW, provide customized solutions for optimizing advertising revenue, measuring visibility, and strategically refreshing ads.

Publishers can unlock the full potential of digital advertising and flourish in the era of the Attention Revolution.

Experience the transformative power of InsurAds and achieve unparalleled success in the dynamic and competitive landscape of digital publishing.

Company Website

To learn more , please visit our website - https://insurads.com/

Company Information

Stibo DX is a market leader in digital asset management, content creation, and publishing platforms for media and news publishers. The CUE Content Management (CMS) and Digital Asset Management solution (DAM) is the core of the best-run newsrooms worldwide. In a rapidly changing technology landscape, CUE helps power creative storytelling and efficient publishing across all media outlets while lowering total-cost-of-ownership compared to legacy and home-grown systems.

Our solution is a microservices-based architecture that focuses on:

• Efficient production of content for all channels in one place

• Managing all digital assets in one central hub

• Integrated print CMS, e-paper solution, and digital storytelling

• Delivering content to any digital endpoint in native form

• Managing stories, resources, and workflows across teams easily

• Available as a flexible SaaS solution as well as on-premise

• Clean user interface and easy workflows for all users powered by intuitive UX

Company Website

To learn more , please visit our website - https://www.stibodx.com/
